title: Slow cooker chicken curry with cauliflower
ingredients: ['2 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes, drained', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '2 tablespoons freshly grated ginger', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt, or to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper', '1 small cauliflower, cored and cut into florets', '675g skinless, boneless chicken thighs', '1 onion, finely chopped', '40g raisins', '25g chopped freshly chopped coriander, for garnish (optional)']
